name: Bubble & Fugl
description:
Two player game, best played with one xbox controller and keyboard or two xbox controllers. Windows build seems to works better than WebGL. One player plays as bubbels and the other as the bird

Made by: Andreas NG, Annalea, Erik, Shukri, Olle, Heks

Sound used:

https://freesound.org/people/zagi2/sounds/386601/

https://freesound.org/people/JoelAudio/sounds/135465/
